name: Amazing and Easy Chicken Wings
author: Rebecca O- hingham, MA
summary: These chicken wings are surprisingly delicious for how few ingredients are involved! I made them for the first time at a football party, and within 10 minutes everyone had eaten all 5 pounds!
ingredients: 5 pounds chicken wings, cut into thirds and tips discarded
directions: Mix brown sugar, mustard, and soy sauce together in a bowl
Measure 1/4 cup marinade for basting and transfer to a small bowl; cover and refrigerate
Place wings in a large resealable bag
Pour remaining marinade over wings, coating well
Seal and marinate wings at least 2 hours and up to overnight
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Remove chicken wings from resealable bag and transfer to a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes
Baste wings with reserved 1/4 cup marinade; cook, basting every 10 minutes, until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 30 more minutes
